scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production firebase functions:config:set settings.region=$(node --loader ts-node/esm src/utils/getRegion.ts) && rm -rf ./dist && tsc
scripts.build-dev: firebase functions:config:set settings.region=$(node --loader ts-node/esm src/utils/getRegion.ts) && rm -rf ./dist && tsc
scripts.serve: yarn run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
